name: .BTI File Extension
summary: Learn about .BTI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Texture file used by Nintendo GameCube, Wii and Nintendo DS games such as Zelda and Mario series games; sometimes altered by the modding community to change the look of virtual characters or the environment.

content: The BTI image format is similar to the .BREFT, .TEX0, and .TPL Wii image formats. You can convert BTI files to these formats along with the .PNG format using Wiimms SZS Tools.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
